channel.title: Fractize | World PvP | Random drops
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt][b]Fractize - What PvP was when it was fun[/b][/size] Download: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/73757294/Fractize.jar Website: http://fractize525.webstarts.com
[b]The items in donor shop u can get in drop or ask a donor to buy it for u. 1-28 Goodie bag for the players joining.[/b]
[size=15pt]Why should I pick Fractize?[/size] [b]We do not give staff rank to anyone only the ones who actually deserves it. We are updating your adventure daily.[/b]
[b]Features[/b] Safe pvp at home Random pvp drops Quests Custom zones

So… it’s safe pking on the whole server?

No just at Varrock, Grand exchange and minigames like fight pits and clan wars

item.title: Fractize | World PvP | Random drops
item.dc:creator: @hxze hxze
item.description:
@hxze wrote:

Project Runescape:

Now you just sound really stupid. :palm:

What hes saying is true though, it’s still pay2win because you’re giving the donators an advantage over those who don’t donate. Any server with a donation process will always be pay2win to an extent, because that’s the whole purpose of donating - to get an edge over the other players, and get better items, or some sort of perk that will help you…

Just because the non-donators can get those items, doesn’t make it not Pay2win; they have to work for something that a Donator can get instantly. Very few servers manage to have a donation system that is not Pay2win, and is evenly balanced.

Read full topic

item.title: Fractize | World PvP | Random drops
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Project Runescape, post:7, topic:554245”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=673168.msg4501603#msg4501603 date=1451505686]
I don’t think you understand what “pay 2 win” is.
Pay 2 win, is paying to get an advantage. Even if the regular, non paying, players can still gain access to the items, you are giving the paying players immediate access. Where as the non paying have to work towards it.

It’s like: Pay $5 and get a chaotic, or spend 5 hours camping an npc to maybe get the drop (Or buy it from another player, which takes time as well due to you having to make the GP).

Want to remove the pay 2 win aspect? Remove literally every item from that donator shop except for the partyhats, and the gnome scarf. They get to stay because they are purely cosmetic, and do not give you an advantage over others (Except in terms of wealth, however due to them being buyable via irl money, their game value drops).
[/quote]
True but everything is still obtainable for non donors, it does not take 5 hours to get a rare you will probably get a rare drop within 20-50 kills.

Update:
Poisoning[/quote]
Doesn’t change the fact that you are advertising a lie.

How about I go offer people to buy their 99s for $1/skill.
But wait, that’s not pay 2 win because other people can just train it.

Read full topic

item.title: Fractize | World PvP | Random drops
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I don’t think you understand what “pay 2 win” is.
Pay 2 win, is paying to get an advantage. Even if the regular, non paying, players can still gain access to the items, you are giving the paying players immediate access. Where as the non paying have to work towards it.

It’s like: Pay $5 and get a chaotic, or spend 5 hours camping an npc to maybe get the drop (Or buy it from another player, which takes time as well due to you having to make the GP).

Want to remove the pay 2 win aspect? Remove literally every item from that donator shop except for the partyhats, and the gnome scarf. They get to stay because they are purely cosmetic, and do not give you an advantage over others (Except in terms of wealth, however due to them being buyable via irl money, their game value drops).
